snippet.textDisplay:
All those fetuses are not sinned
Who are you and I
to find a fault in?

A hole in the bamboo stick
Brings out a good song


Even the clouds turn dark and black
to bring the rain back
for survival of crops and
for survival of mankind!

A hut in a village
Green trees lined up by the river
And there lived people
that are Open and innocent...

In the sound of the banyan tree
Everyone in deep sleep
Earth is so far away
And who would know the reason?
Why are you born?  Why are you born?

snippet.textDisplay:
Part 1 of ARR:

In a village there was one hut...
Lot of trees(in lines) along the riverbed...
The people of the village were innocent...
oh aariro aariro(lullaby)...

In the sound of banyan tree...
The whole people were at sleep...
That world is too far...
Who know the reason why?...

Why did you born? X 3...
(until here you can consider lullaby sung to an infant)
snippet.textOriginal:
Part 1 of ARR:

In a village there was one hut...
Lot of trees(in lines) along the riverbed...
The people of the village were innocent...
oh aariro aariro(lullaby)...

In the sound of banyan tree...
The whole people were at sleep...
That world is too far...
Who know the reason why?...

Why did you born? X 3...
(until here you can consider lullaby sung to an infant)

snippet.textDisplay:
I tried my best to translate:

Rayhanah:

all the infant(Literal translation: unborn fetus) are un-sinned...
Who are we(you and me) to critize the flaws (in them)...
Only the bamboo with the hole produces loud song(if you think hole is the flaw)...
Only the dark cloud pours the rain for the life of crop to keep us alive(if you think dark color is a flaw)...

snippet.textDisplay:
Part - 3:

(Now, song starts from infant point of view)
Why did I born?
Why did I opened my eyes?
I dont know myself

Everthing created by god is beautiful
Flowers(metaphor to every creation by god here) doesnt know about it

Why did I born?
Why did I opened my eyes?
I dont know myself

all the unborn featus are un-sinned one
Who are we(you and me) to critize the flaws (in them)

snippet.textDisplay:
THe Drummer is SIVAMANI... he has been with rehman sir from the beginning.  REhman sir's music is the best you can hear, the fusion of music is amazing. if you need to hear some good songs. let me know. will send you a few links or a playlist..
But for starters listen to bombay movie theme. Assured to give you goosebumps

snippet.textDisplay: Hi friends..this is Thalaatu song in Tamil...Thalaatu means "Mothers used to sing for their childrens sleep",,if childrens hear that then they will sleep...
